Title: Ti fidi di me?
Writer: Roberto Saviano (idea), Roberto Saviano (novel), Giovanni Bianconi (developer), Stefano Bises (developer), Leonardo Fasoli (developer), Ludovica Rampoldi (developer), Roberto Saviano (developer), Stefano Bises (story editor), Ludovica Rampoldi
Actors: Marco D'Amore, Fortunato Cerlino, Maria Pia Calzone, Salvatore Esposito
Plot: When Genny creates a rift with another clan, Pietro decides it's time to put him to the test and asks Ciro to mentor him. Pietro then tests Ciro's loyalty in his own unique way.
